title: Estimate Project Hours
description: A salesperson asks a Professional Services consultant to estimate the number of hours required for a potential project.

tasks.description: Review the high-level requirements from the salesperson.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant understands the scope of the potential project.

tasks.description: Break down the requirements into standard implementation tasks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a work breakdown structure.

tasks.description: Use a standard estimation model to assign hours to each task and provide a total estimate to the salesperson.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant provides an accurate and defensible estimate.
